nodes.title: Understanding Cognitive Biases in Software Development
nodes.excerpt: After years of referencing Wikipedia's tangled list of 175 cognitive biases, I've distilled them into a clearer framework that's…
nodes.description: How cognitive biases affect our decision-making in tech teams and what we can do about it

nodes.title: Why Returning to the Office Is an Outdated Approach in Software Development
nodes.excerpt: In recent months, many companies have pushed for a return to the office, hoping to recapture pre-pandemic collaboration and culture. But…
nodes.description: Exploring why mandatory office returns don't work for modern software teams and what actually drives productivity.
